short_summary: Period 2 - RISO Purchase of Carbonless Paper for CORCAN
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and offer must be submitted at the latest by 2 PM EST on December 15, 2022. All offers submitted after 2 PM EST will result in the offer being declared non-responsive. This is a request for a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) to supply on as-and-when requested basis, carbonless paper for CORCAN, La Macaza Establishment, Province of Quebec, as detailed in Section 8.
full_summary:
# 21C31-220031 - Period 2 - CORCAN Regional Individual Standing Offer for Carbonless Paper

## Solicitation Details

* Reference Number: WS3520037216- Doc3716920469
* Solicitation Number: WS3520037216
* Amendment Number: 2
* Publication Date: November 28, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: December 15, 2022, 14:00 EST
* Amendment Date: December 13, 2022

## Contract Details

* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: January 14, 2023
* Regions of Delivery: Rivière-Rouge

## Procurement Information

* Tender Status: Expired
* Procurement Category: Goods and Services
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

## Trade Agreements

* This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement

## End-User Information

* End-User Entity: CORCAN
* End-User Address: 340 Laurier Avenue West, Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 0P9, Canada

## Contact Information

* Contact Name: Corine Lavoie (SPAC/PSPC)
* Contact Email: [corine.lavoie@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:corine.lavoie@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Tender Description:
The Department of Public Works and Government Services invites suppliers to submit a bid for a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) to supply carbonless paper for CORCAN, La Macaza Establishment, Province of Quebec. 
This tender is subject to the trade agreements specified above.
Tenders must be submitted by 2:00 PM EST on December 15, 2022, or they will be deemed non-responsive.
Please refer to Section 8 for detailed requirements and specifications.

Note: This is a simplified version of the actual solicitation notice. Please review the complete notice for more detailed information and specific requirements.  [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14753559?extsite=MTQ3NTM
